content: Please provide the names of two renowned baseball athletes who have won MVP awards and have a batting average of at least .300 for the past three consecutive seasons.

As of my last update in October 2023, two renowned baseball athletes who have won MVP awards and have maintained a batting average of at least .300 over three consecutive seasons are:

1. **Mike Trout** - A perennial MVP candidate and one of the most consistent hitters in baseball, Mike Trout has often maintained a batting average above .300.

2. **Mookie Betts** - Another exceptional player, Mookie Betts has consistently performed at a high level both offensively and defensively, earning MVP honors and maintaining a strong batting average.

Please note that player statistics can change, and it is always a good idea to check the latest stats for the most current information.
